content.raw: Yes, we definitely should unload plugins when the entity they're attached to are deleted. This is a bit beyond the scope of this PR though, I think the `SimulationRunner`, the `EntityComponentManager` and the `SystemLoader` will need to keep track of when an entity is deleted and unload the appropriate plugins. I ticketed a task for Ign-B.
